question: What is the single railway helplines number, which has been integrated for all types of queries?
explanation:
The Indian Railways has integrated all railway helplines into single number 139 (also called as the Rail Madad Helpline).
The number would be used for quick grievance redressal and enquiry during the journey, including all types of complaints and queries during travel. Another important Helpline no. 182 would also be discontinued from April 2021 and will be merged into 139.
